author: wn.com
title: Member News: UK’s Leading Markets Operator Hires SKV (Greater Manchester Chamber of Commerce)
text: ( Source : Greater Manchester Chamber of Commerce ) The largest markets operator in Europe has appointed SKV Communications to raise its corporate profile. With its UK headquarters in Merseyside , Groupe Geraud is the leading markets provider
